bsseq.bsseeker_call_methy.commandLine:
samtools view /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt63_22/shard-0/ScatterAt63_22/b6a47f6b-fd86-44bd-a9ac-bb7d2d9bceea/call-bsseeker_call_methy/shard-0/inputs/2014276597/sample_A_sort_rmSX.bam chr1 -h | samtools view -Sb - > chr1.bam
/jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/biosoft/miniconda3/envs/py27/bin/python \
/jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/biosoft/BSseeker/bs_seeker2-call_methylation.py \
-i chr1.bam \
-d /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-bsseeker_build_index/execution/test.fa_bowtie2 \
-o chr1 \
--rm-CCGG \
--rm-overlap
rm chr1.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam
rm chr1.bam_sorted.bam.bai

samtools view /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt63_22/shard-1/ScatterAt63_22/8b604d5e-7689-4c08-89ae-c691209b91d5/call-bsseeker_call_methy/shard-0/inputs/217325238/sample_B_sort_rmSX.bam chr1 -h | samtools view -Sb - > chr1.bam
/jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/biosoft/miniconda3/envs/py27/bin/python \
/jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/biosoft/BSseeker/bs_seeker2-call_methylation.py \
-i chr1.bam \
-d /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-bsseeker_build_index/execution/test.fa_bowtie2 \

bsseq.bsseeker_align_mergeBam.commandLine:
samtools merge merge.bam /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt42_22/shard-0/ScatterAt42_22/eb2a8d8d-9542-457f-b63c-7e8ebb40088d/call-bsseeker_align_bam/shard-0/execution/glob-6a77f3e6bd9ec61ca860dc233b28effa/R1_aa.bam /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt42_22/shard-0/ScatterAt42_22/eb2a8d8d-9542-457f-b63c-7e8ebb40088d/call-bsseeker_align_bam/shard-0/execution/glob-6a77f3e6bd9ec61ca860dc233b28effa/R2_aa_anti.bam
samtools sort merge.bam -o sample_A_sort.bam
samtools view -h sample_A_sort.bam | grep -v 'XS:i:1' | samtools view -bS - > sample_A_sort_rmSX.bam
samtools index sample_A_sort_rmSX.bam
rm merge.bam 
samtools idxstats sample_A_sort_rmSX.bam |cut -f 1 |grep -e "[A-Za-z1-9]" > chr.id

samtools merge merge.bam /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt42_22/shard-1/ScatterAt42_22/03b0c742-a353-4ad1-9803-212c294e8df5/call-bsseeker_align_bam/shard-0/execution/glob-6a77f3e6bd9ec61ca860dc233b28effa/R1_aa.bam /jdfssz1/ST_HEALTH/P21Z10200N0092/wangjiaxuan/workflow/BSseq/cromwell-executions/bsseq/1c4b4e51-caf2-4033-9d1f-c1b1d5ed0e1a/call-ScatterAt42_22/shard-1/ScatterAt42_22/03b0c742-a353-4ad1-9803-212c294e8df5/call-bsseeker_align_bam/shard-0/execution/glob-6a77f3e6bd9ec61ca860dc233b28effa/R2_aa_anti.bam

samtools view -h sample_B_sort.bam | grep -v 'XS:i:1' | samtools view -bS - > sample_B_sort_rmSX.bam
samtools index sample_B_sort_rmSX.bam
rm merge.bam
